org.spongepowered.api.text.message

Interface Message<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of this Message's content
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Message<T>>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Message.Score, Message.Selector, Message.Text, Message.Translatable

    public interface Message<T>
extends java.lang.Iterable<Message<T>>
    A Message represents some text in the new raw JSON message format. Message is an immutable class that is created by a MessageBuilder, and each getter method maps to a field or some fields in JSON. Message is also an Iterable whose iterator iterates over its children, children's children, etc. recursively.

    Among other places, it shows up in books, signs, titles, chat, and the /tellraw command.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Message.Score
      A Score Message is a message with a Score as content.
      static interface  Message.Selector
      A Selector Message is a message with a Selector as content.
      static interface  Message.Text
      A Text Message is a message with a String as content.
      static interface  Message.Translatable
      A Translatable Message is a message with a Translation as content.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessageBuilder<T> builder()
      Returns a new MessageBuilder with the content of this message.
      java.util.List<Message<?>> getChildren()
      Returns the children of this Message.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<ClickAction<?>> getClickAction()
      Returns the action for when this text is clicked.
      TextColor getColor()
      Returns the color of this Message.
      T getContent()
      Returns the main content of this Message.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<HoverAction<?>> getHoverAction()
      Returns the action for when this text is hovered over.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<ShiftClickAction<?>> getShiftClickAction()
      Returns the action for when this text is shift-clicked.
      TextStyle getStyle()
      Returns the style of this Message.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Iterable

        forEach, iterator, spliterator

    • Method Detail

      • getContent

        T getContent()
        Returns the main content of this Message. This maps to the text, translation, selector, or score field in JSON depending on the type of Message.
        Returns:
        The content of this Message

      • getColor

        TextColor getColor()
        Returns the color of this Message. This maps to the color field in JSON.
        Returns:
        The color of this Message

      • getStyle

        TextStyle getStyle()
        Returns the style of this Message. Depending on which styles are contained, this method maps to the various style fields in JSON.
        Returns:
        The style of this Message

      • getChildren

        java.util.List<Message<?>> getChildren()
        Returns the children of this Message. This maps to the with or extra fields in JSON depending on this Message type.
        Returns:
        This Message's children

      • getClickAction

        com.google.common.base.Optional<ClickAction<?>> getClickAction()
        Returns the action for when this text is clicked. This maps to the clickEvent field in JSON.
        Returns:
        The ClickAction of this Message

      • getHoverAction

        com.google.common.base.Optional<HoverAction<?>> getHoverAction()
        Returns the action for when this text is hovered over. This maps to the hoverEvent field in JSON.
        Returns:
        The HoverAction of this Message

      • getShiftClickAction

        com.google.common.base.Optional<ShiftClickAction<?>> getShiftClickAction()
        Returns the action for when this text is shift-clicked. This maps to the insertion field in JSON, because that is the only possible shift-click action.
        Returns:
        The ShiftClickAction of this Message

      • builder

        MessageBuilder<T> builder()
        Returns a new MessageBuilder with the content of this message.
        Returns:
        A new MessageBuilder to modify this message
